entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 2:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
